Key Match Events: Nitish Kumar Reddy scored 74 off 34 balls
Miscellaneous Highlights: India took an unassailable 2-0 lead in the three-match series
Others: Arshdeep Singh took the wicket of Parvez Hossain Emon
Washington Sundar took the wicket of Najmul Hossain Shanto
Varun Chakaravarthy took the wicket of Litton Das
